name: stevens
description:
A short, cute, Christmas-y pixel-y story about a cat named Stevens.

Half a submission for Winter VN Jam 2021. Other half of submission coming soon.

Playable in browser above (Safari has issues, surprising no one: No sound and other random errors. Chrome and Firefox appear to work fine) or download via links below.

If you enjoyed  the game and would like to see more, let me know. If there's any demand for it, I could make a longer VN or a series out of it.

If you'd like to check out other lazytiger shenanigans, you can hit up itch, twitter or insta.
